Package com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.linearpathmatch.split

Class Summary
FlatPath Records the line segments making up a LinearPath as a list of vertices, along with index information about their position in the original path.
NodesOnPath Determines the split nodes which will be actually be used to split a path.
PathZipper Given a PathMatch, determines the splits in each path and matches the resulting split paths together.
PlaceAtClosestPoint Places split nodes at their closest point on the split path, if possible.
PlaceBackward A strategy class to place unmatched splitnodes by a backwards pass through the split node array.
PlaceForward A strategy class to place splitting nodes along the path in a forward direction only (i.e.
QuantizedPath Discretizes a FlatPath quantized by a Minimum Segment Length.
QuantumIndex Represents a location along a LinearPath discretized by a minimum segment length.
QuantumInterval Represents an interval between two QuantumIndexes.
SnapToNodes Optimizes the splitting of a path by snapping split nodes to nodes on the path if they are within tolerance.
SplitEdge An edge of a the final geometry of a SplitPath.
SplitEdgesBuilder A factory to create the SplitEdges for a SplitPath based on the final locations of the SplitNodes.
SplitNode A location on a SplitPath where a split will take place.
SplitNodeList Represents the split nodes induced by a set of splitting nodes on a split path.
SplitPath Allows a LinearPath to be split at node locations, according to optimality and correctness heuristics.
SplitPathMatcher Splits two matched @link LinearPaths} according to their respective noding, and matches the resulting SplitPaths.
